branchCategory.name: Detection Switches
branchCategory.description: <p>To further compliment an abundant line of air preparation and connector equipment, SMC offers a selection of electronic sensors including digital pressure switches, vacuum switches, and flow switches.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE40
branchItem.description: <p>High precision digital pressure switch series 90-ISE40A is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. &nbsp;Abnormal values can be seen at a glance on the 2-color display.&nbsp; The settings of the master pressure switch can be copied to up to 10 slave pressure switches, reducing the setting work, and preventing mistakes in setting.&nbsp; Other features include: simple 3-step setting, analog output, wide variety of piping variations, and a power-saving function for MPa-kPa.&nbsp; The ISE40A is also CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliant.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE50
branchItem.description: <p>High precision digital pressure switch series 90-ISE50 is a standard thread type for positive pressure.&nbsp;90-ISE50 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 90-ISE50 is used for a wide range of fluids. The stainless steel diaphragm prevents direct contact between sensor and measured fluid.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE40(F)
branchItem.description: <p>High precision digital pressure switch seris 90-ZSE40A series is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing..&nbsp; Abnormal values can be seen at a glance on the 2-color display.&nbsp; The settings of the master pressure switch can be copied to up to 10 slave pressure switches, reducing the setting work, and preventing mistakes in setting.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE50(F)
branchItem.description: <p>High precision digital pressure switch series 90-ZSE50 is a standard thread type for compound pressure.&nbsp; 90-ZSE50 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. 90-ZSE50 is used for a wide range of fluids. The stainless steel diaphragm prevents direct contact between sensor and measured fluid.&nbsp; Sensor and fittings are electro-beam welded.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

branchItem.name: PFM
branchItem.description: <p>Digital Flow Switch series 90-PFM7 is dual color digital&nbsp;and was developed initially to detect microchip component adsorption in vacuum, and early clogging in both filter and nozzle applications.&nbsp; The series is incredibly compact and lightweight compared to existing flow sensors.&nbsp;90-PFM7 is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing.</p>

branchItem.name: PF2W
branchItem.description: <p>Digital flow switch series 90-PF2W is designed to check water flow rates. 90-PF2W is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. Flow rate setting and monitoring are possible with the digital display. Integrated and remote type displays are available for different types of application. Water resistant construction is used conforming to IP65 protection. Switching from real-time flow rate to accumulated flow is possible.</p>
